resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit this quiz?
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s? This will not affect any Spotify playlists, and you can add them again later.
Are you sure you want to clear image cache? This will reduce memory usage, but may increase network traffic.
Are you sure you want to delete all playlists? This will not affect playlists on Spotify, and you can add them again later.
Are you sure you want to exit?
